top_categories.workout_context: Gun Flint 44’s mn north shore, rolling gravel demands rapid power changes — surge over obstacles, settle on smoother sections, repeat for hours.
Racing Gun Flint 44 isn’t just fitness — it’s pacing, fueling, and executing when conditions deteriorate. This workout practices the race itself.
Gun Flint 44’s mn rolling gravel and competitive field demand explosive aerobic capacity — the ability to respond to surges without blowing up.
Gun Flint 44 rewards athletes who can hold sustained power without blowing up — threshold is the engine that drives everything above Zone 2.
Over-unders train the lactate clearance you’ll need at Gun Flint 44 when surges push you above threshold and you have to recover while still riding hard.
Critical power determines how long you can sustain above-threshold efforts at Gun Flint 44 — a higher CP means more time in the red before failure.
Gun Flint 44’s mn rolling gravel drains energy reserves faster than the distance suggests — durability training bridges the gap.
The varied gradients at Gun Flint 44 reward climbing adaptability — knowing when to sit, when to stand, and when to switch.
Short, violent efforts are unavoidable at Gun Flint 44 — climbs demanding 2-minute maximal efforts, surges to close gaps, attacks on mn rolling gravel.
The G-Spot zone (88–92% FTP) is where you’ll spend the hardest sustained miles of Gun Flint 44. Make this intensity feel like home.
Muscular force work builds the torque for headwinds and mn rolling gravel at Gun Flint 44 — when you can’t spin, you grind.
Cadence efficiency makes every pedal stroke at Gun Flint 44 count — smooth technique reduces muscular fatigue over long distances.

race_overlay.nutrition: Target 40–60g carbs/hour for Gun Flint 44’s 44 miles. Front-load calories in the first half. One bottle per hour minimum, more in heat.
race_overlay.terrain: Mixed terrain at Gun Flint 44 requires surface adaptability. Include weekly rides on mn rolling gravel to build confidence. Expect: mn north shore, rolling gravel, regional event.

pack_summary: This 10-workout pack focuses on Gravel Specific, Race Simulation, and VO2max to prepare you for 44 miles of mn rolling gravel in Grand Marais, Minnesota.
